Authors:
Altielys Casale Magnago, Terry Henkel, Maria Alice Neves,
Rosa Mara Borges da Silveira
Title:
Singerocomus atlanticus sp. nov., and a first record of
Singerocomus rubriflavus for Brazil
Keywords:
Atlantic Forest, Boletales, ITS and LSU sequences,
Neotropics, taxonomy
Abstract:
Ongoing surveys of macrofungi along the Brazilian Atlantic
Forest have uncovered a diverse assemblage of boletoid fungi.
Singerocomus atlanticus is here proposed as new based on morphological
and molecular data. Singerocomus rubriflavus is registered for the first
time for Brazil in the Atlantic Forest. Phylogenetic data, photographs
of the basidiomata, microscopic illustrations, and comments are
presented for each species.
